sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Germany secured its first ever Basketball World Cup title with a hard-fought win over Serbia in the final held in Manila.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The 83-77 triumph came after a flawless tournament run for Dennis Schroeder's teammates marking their impressive rise in international basketball as they will now set their sights on future success including the Paris Olympics. Schroeder led the way with 28 points while Franz Wagner added 19 to seal the deal. In the semis Germany shocked the United States with a narrow two-point win and the world's most successful basketball nation eventually missed out on a podium finish after losing out to Canada in the bronze medal game.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Manchester United winger Anthony has been given a leave of absence in order to address allegations made against him of violence towards women.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The 23-year-old was recently omitted from the Brazil squad due to accusations of physical aggression towards his former girlfriend Gabriela Cavaín.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: These allegations are under police investigation and Anthony denies any wrongdoing. In an agreement with the player, Manchester United has allowed him to delay his return. The former Ajax winger says he will cooperate with police in order to prove his innocence.
